Text: I'm not sure it is fixed. It's been stuck at 99% complete all day.

It's stuck, but as far as I can tell all the books download except for the epub version of The Lincoln Conspiracy.

So, unless that's the one book you're REALLY looking for, go ahead and download.

Oh, and it looks like there are two copies of Lincoln Conspiracy and one of the downloads fully--I had thought it was a copy in a different format.

So, there you have it. Even if you're stuck at 99%, it appears as if you'll have the entire download at that point.
How do you convert downloaded epub files, so that you can use them on iphone/ipad? Can anyone help? Will be much appreciated.
bighss, no file conversion needed just open your itunes with your ipad connected, go to "on this ipad" at the top right, open books and drop them in =).
Thx mmcquagge, you were a great help :)
